pr_title: Support aggregation function name with underscore inside

timeline.message: Support aggregation function name with underscore inside

timeline.bodyText: This will break ST_Union. Can we first look up with original function name, and if not found, replace _ then?
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.message: Support aggregation function name with underscore inside

timeline.bodyText:
This won't cover functions such as percentile_tdigest.
We can make the current one a private helper method, and add a new getAggregationFunctionType to look up for both functionName with/without underscore
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang
Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: Check if it contains underscore before the second lookup for performance
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.message: Support aggregation function name with underscore inside
Support aggregation function name with underscore inside

timeline.bodyText:
Why do we have to do upperCase again?
AggregationFunctionType is an enum so getName() should return upper case right?
timeline.author: siddharthteotia

replies.bodyText:
We defined enums as:
  PERCENTILEMV("percentileMV"),
  PERCENTILEESTMV("percentileEstMV"),
  PERCENTILETDIGESTMV("percentileTDigestMV"),
replies.author: xiangfu0

timeline.message: Change ST_Union AggregationType enum to STUnion
